NHAI/CMD / Misc. /CIL/2018-Vol.II] Sub.: Format for   Indemnity Bond to be obtained from Concessionaire Contractor in compliance to para 3.5 of NHAI Policy Guidelines/EPC & DBFOT Contract/2019 no_ 2.5.11/2019 dated 17th 2019_ Please find enclosed herewith format for Indemnity Bond to be obtained from Concessionaire/ Contractor in compliance to para 3.5 of NHAI Policy Guidelines/EPC & DBFOT Contract/2019 no_ 2.5.11/2019 dated 17th 2019. As desired vide aforesaid policy guidelines the unconditional Indemnity bonds shall be obtained and kept securely. Encl : As stated above. Jz (V.K. Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord) to (i) All Officers and employee of HQ/ROs/PIU/CMUs/ Site offices: (ii) Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi.
